text: The Golden Gate is a historical gate in Gdańsk, Poland. It is a stone building with an archway leading into the Old Town. It was built in 1612. It was created in the place of an older 13th-century Gothic gate called the Brama Długouliczna. Category:Gates Category:Buildings and structures in Gdańsk Category:Buildings and structures in Poland
title: Golden Gate (Gdańsk)
